description: Learn how to knit a modern, cozy blanket in under an hour. The trick: Your own two arms! That's right. In this 45-minute class, knitting star Amanda Bassetti of Simply Maggie teaches you the basics of arm-knitting while creating a chic throw for your home (or gifting)! This is the perfect project for first-time knitters or advanced knitters looking to break out of their usual routine. Either way, you won't believe how fast it goes! This course is aimed at beginners who want to learn how to do basic arm knitting and is relevant to knitters wanting to create blankets or throws.
title: Learn To Make The Fastest Arm Knit Throw Ever
